com.jackychu.app.tictactoe

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackychu.app.tictactoe.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Game
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class store the tic-tac-toe (3x3) game status.
    Each cell on the board is one of three kind of values: 0 for no mark, 1 for player 1, 2 for player 2.
    Players who is O or X depends on UI representation
    TODO: Enhance to support dimension larger than 3
    See Also:

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime()
        The lastUpdateTime cannot change by user directly.
        When call this method. The lastUpdateTime will be set to current time millis.
        To avoid bad time format and time sequence.

      • getLastUpdateTime

        public long getLastUpdateTime()

      • validate

        public boolean validate(Game latestGame)
        Compare current game with lastest game.
        1. The id should be the same
        2. the dimension should be the same
        3. lastest game's lastUpdateTime should be greater then current game
        4. Game status check
        5. grid data check
        Parameters:
        latestGame - latest game object
        Returns:
        true for the latest game is the next status of current game.

      • checkWinner

        public int checkWinner()
        Check who is the winner
        Returns:
        0 for no winner (maybe draw or the game still playing). 1 for player 1, 2 for player 2.

      • checkFull

        public boolean checkFull()
        Check the game board's cells were be placed.
        Returns:
        true for game board cells were all placed.
